body:
Hi djordje, I have tried your component, it is great! Especially if you want to create large areas.
You are right about the difference of the sources, in fact I have compared the results of same locations (Vesuvius and Rome, Campidoglio) and the results are very different. I'm agree with you, we can release both. Best
Antonello P.S. for the icon, it is all right! ;)
